ygData.subject: Re: Memmed spells
ygData.msgSnippet: You ve obviously never dealt with hags or just didn t think before you spoke.  Hags *spells* are the thing that will kill you.  Seeing as they stop to cast on
ygData.messageBody:
You've obviously never dealt with hags or just didn't think before you
spoke. Hags *spells* are the thing that will kill you. Seeing as they
stop to cast on you very frequently during chase you can put enough
distance between you and them while divine is on before you get to the
zone. So by the time ya make it to the zone they are out of range for
spells and divine has saved you again. All you need is about 10 secs to
make it away from a hag. They will just stand there are try to cast on
you.
